Transfer Instructions: Records will be transferred when 15 years old.
Agency's Capstone designated employees' emails will be transferred to NARA when 15 years old.
Transfer to the National Archives 15 years after cut off.  Delete all other versions, such as those existing in live systems and agency archives.

After cutoff, transfer account to Naval History and Heritage Command (NHHC) for SECNAV and U.S. Navy accounts; transfer to Administration and Resource Management Division (ARDB) for U.S. Marine Corps accounts. Unclassified email: Transfer to the National Archives 15 years after cutoff.Classified email: Transfer to the National Archives 25 years after cutoff after declassification review.
Transfer of records will be 15 years after employees tenure.
Item 10 - Transfer 10 years after cutoff  (Chairman and Commissioners serve 5 year appointments; equaling 15 year transfer)
